short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cover roles for mafia games videos on Youtube. Features: hides roles, blurs the video during nights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cover roles for mafia games videos on Youtube. 
1. Hide the roles with the cover view. Adjust it's size manually to the specific layout used on the video.
2. Video is blurred during the nights (when video is silent for long).
3. Video is blurred when pausing, moving to another time to prevent accidental roles opening.
